page.title: 17ST.PAUL'S CHURCH HALL
page.content: {St Paul's Parish Hall}is the centre of considerable public recreational and leisure activity both of a religious and secular nature.It is one of the only real community centres in the area. The Hall is used by the{Cub Scouts,the {Scouts,the Guides,the Brownies,the {Sunday School,a Remote Control Model {Car}Club,and is used to stage plays by the school and the church groups and discos by the Scouts. The{Scout Discos}are held every month and the money that is raised by these events is shared between the Hall and the Scout Fund which is trying to buy a new Scout mini-bus. A{Caledonian Pipe Band}practises there each week and regular{Old Time and {Ballroom dancing classes}are held during the afternoons.
